questions.question: When was the first known use of the word 'quiz'?
What is the name of the first computer programmer?
Which built-in function can get information from the user?
What is the purpose of the built-in zip() function?
choices: To iterate over two or more sequences at the same time
To combine several strings into one
To compress several files into one archive
To get information from the user
questions.correct_answer: To iterate over two or more sequences at the same time

questions.question: Which keyword do you use to loop over a given list of items?
What is the purpose of the built-in range() function?
choices: To iterate over a list of numbers
To create a list of numbers
To create a list of strings
To create a list of characters
questions.correct_answer: To iterate over a list of numbers
